trans-unit.source: The troubleshooting tasks explain how to diagnose the cause of and recover from problems.

seg-source.mrk: The troubleshooting tasks explain how to diagnose the cause of and recover from problems.

target.mrk: The troubleshooting tasks explain how to diagnose the cause of and recover from problems.

trans-unit.source: To fix a problem, you often have to configure or maintain a component. The troubleshooting tasks help you determine what to work on to get back to normal operations.

seg-source.mrk: To fix a problem, you often have to configure or maintain a component.
The troubleshooting tasks help you determine what to work on to get back to normal operations.

target.mrk: To fix a problem, you often have to configure or maintain a component.
The troubleshooting tasks help you determine what to work on to get back to normal operations.
